# Test Section

<!-- style:AdmonitionNote -->
> This is a note.
> Second line.

<!-- style:AdmonitionTip -->
> This is a tip.

Test a more basic admonition.

<!-- style:AdmonitionNote -->
> We recommend turning off the splines view (i.e 'Show Layer Outlines') during adjusting the track so you can see the adjustment of points clearly.
